scripts.start: node -e "fs=require('fs');['site', 'site/res', 'site/res/jshint'].forEach(function(path) {fs.existsSync(path) || fs.mkdirSync(path)})" && cp -r node_modules/jshint/dist/* site/res/jshint/ && oddweb dev .
scripts.build: node -e "fs=require('fs');['site', 'site/res', 'site/res/jshint'].forEach(function(path) {fs.existsSync(path) || fs.mkdirSync(path)})" && cp -r node_modules/jshint/dist/* site/res/jshint/ && oddweb build .
